html:
7.11.17  2:21 pm   do you appreciate knowledge?

     oh hell yeah

7.11.17  2:18 pm   On ask.fm you said once that in the Shorty Awards they won't let you wear sneakers and jeans... but they let the announcer wear whatever he wanted. That's not fair. You look great on suit btw 

     everyone wore sneakers. i was tricked. especially because i bought all these crazy sneakers, before i found out that you aren't 'supposed' to wear them. so i didn't wear them, but everyone else did. so the lesson is, always wear the sneakers. oh well, the good news is now i have crazy sneakers and they're still crazy

7.11.17  1:38 pm   How can we, ♫Your loving and grateful fans♪ help you to do your thing so you can do your thing?

     i'm not sure. but i am open to ideas

7.11.17  1:10 pm   in the video "hi, im steve", why does a bird bring the mail to steve (that's not his name but whatever) if you already had a mailwoman character? 

     for more of a surprise. also the mail woman never climbed the mountain

7.11.17  10:58 am   you're the only person that seems very pessimistic and very optimistic at the same time. but i can't tell if you're in the middle, i'm not sure how realistic you are. what are you?

7.11.17  10:07 am   do you believe in the right for soda cans to have their own seats on airplanes

     i think they would be more comfortable on the drink cart

7.11.17  9:52 am   Do you have a collection where you store possible melody ideas?

     the melodies and lyrics are always together. and yes

7.11.17  9:27 am   Why is life so weird? 

     so you can figure it out

7.11.17  8:59 am   Do you dislike clothing with symbols, text or other pictures on them?

     no

7.11.17  7:46 am   why don't you look at your videos after they're released, or even want to look at them?

     i surely saw it way more times than i ever wanted to, while i was making it

7.11.17  7:45 am   Hey bill, I asked the question about 1/4 time signatures yesterday (7/10).. you're right that a 1/4 time signature would make each measure only have 1 beat.. but what I mean is, why even break a song up into measures, grouping beats together into 3 or 4 (or whatever) instead of just letting each beat stand alone? I know you can write a song in multiple time signatures anyways.. but I say cut out the middle man, just think tempo/pulse of individual beats instead of grouping beats together. 

     yes, but the majority of all music has a habit of falling into groups of 2, 4, 8, 16, etc. by putting bar lines around 4 beats, and also putting 4 bars per line on the page, it makes it way way easier to read. it's like using periods between sentences, or spaces between words

7.11.17  6:20 am   Why does the "email" page only have a b?

     it has my entire email address, but i respect your opinion

7.11.17  6:07 am   did you know that you have free will and that it doesnt matter what people think of how long the time is in between released content? 

     ah, i almost forgot

7.11.17  6:02 am   why is your content so original

     because i live in a cave

7.11.17  5:15 am   Hi Bill! As an avid musician and songwriter, I seriously draw a lot of inspiration from your works, it gives me a very good feeling inside. I just wanted to ask, are you ever going to put "you're free to do whatever you want to" on iTunes?

     i think so
7.11.17  5:07 am   What do you do in your spare time except making content, eating, sleeping, drinking etc.

7.11.17  5:04 am   if selling merchandise doesn't feel good to you (which i totally understand btw), but you still sort of have to do it, would you think donating the money you'd get from that to charities would help? or is it so that the money isn't the problem but the merch itself is?

     need the money. but merch gives me a very awkward feeling and i never wanted to do it

7.11.17  4:31 am   hi,
about the merch, you know the very vast majority of your fans (i'm not sure you're comfortable with that word, but anyways), are really nice and because of this odd one to one and very close and relatable connection you have with us, most people myself included would more than gladly help you for free for any matter, be it helping with merch design, site maintenance/improvement, anything i can think about really.
it bums be out to see you get the feeling of being overwhelmed by this merch thing bec

     it's going ok although i am starting to open the doors to meet people who might want to help with anything, not just merch. Anything. there's just 10 times more stuff to do than i could ever do at a reasonable pace. it is very difficult because normally i can only think clearly when i do everything myself, but i think it's a good idea to at least try to open those doors. the bad part is now i'm gonna get a thousand emails and i won't be able to respond to them all end everyone's probably gonna get mad at me for that. keep in mind i've never worked with anyone and i don't really know how to do it. but i'm trying to at least open up the possibility in case it magically works somehow

7.11.17  4:02 am   do you have a patreon?

     yes

7.11.17  1:53 am   should you let other people make your decisions for you?

     i don't know, what do you think?

7.11.17  1:41 am   how many times a day are you asked about the spelling on this website, or your lowercase lettering?

     millions, and zillions

7.11.17  1:33 am   Okay, first off: I absolutely love your videos! You are honestly one of my favorite Youtubers because despite most of your content being short, they always have a clever edge to them that makes me laugh on even my saddest days. Now, on that note, what inspired you to make the history of Japan video specifically? That video is how I found out about you and your other vids, so I'm genuinely curious! :)

7.11.17  12:13 am   What's your stance on people editing out the swears in videos like the history of Japan to make school appropriate versions

     i hate it

7.11.17  12:07 am   Does your "history of the world" video from 2 years ago have anything to do with "history of the entire world, i guess" video?

     no

7.10.17  11:57 pm   What do you think of the human race?

     seems like something that could really take off
7.10.17  10:55 pm   Is the earth flat
7.10.17  7:58 pm   How does one make friends?

7.10.17  6:28 pm   will you ever make the history of the entire world

     i want to but i probably shouldn't. that sounds like it would take a long long time
7.10.17  5:46 pm   Why did you start creating music/videos?

7.10.17  5:08 pm   Hi! Is the friendship timeline and scale from the big dreams and goals video, accurate?

     not quite

7.10.17  3:46 pm   why is doing chores such a chore?

     why would it not be

7.10.17  3:28 pm   Do you have any projects you're working on outside of the YouTube content creation sphere?

     questions, merch (and hating it, might stop), reality updates, music, some changes to the site

7.10.17  3:18 pm   can you die

     that seems counter productive

7.10.17  1:35 pm   Since people call 'Steve' 'Steve' doesn't that make his name 'Steve' as names are used to  communicate and everyone is dubbing him as such?

     ah, yes

7.10.17  1:25 pm   favorite game to beat?

     the time space continuum

7.10.17  12:59 pm   How many questions have you been asked

     about 50,000

7.10.17  12:58 pm   Do you like people

     yes

7.10.17  12:45 pm   When you were first learning how to read music... did you use Great Big Dreams For America and All Cows Eat Grass for the lines/spaces of the bass clef and Every Good Boy Does Fine and FACE for the lines/spaces of the treble clef??? Or did you use something different? 

     elvis goes boppin down (the) freeway

7.10.17  12:36 pm   What's the easiest way to be inspired?

     explore

7.10.17  12:10 pm   could you explain the phrase "graphics free title graphics" thanks

     it's like you want to make a title for a page, but instead of using any pictures or graphics, you have to just use text. you can use any technique you want, such as different colors, or even rearranging the letters, to make it more interesting while still not using any actual pictures

7.10.17  11:33 am   What's the point of time signatures? Why not just think of everything as being in 1/4 time?... That way you can have measures containing however many beats you want. 

     if you are in 1/4 then your measures have to contain 1 beat

7.10.17  11:21 am   Hey did u know that whereas is one word?

     it can be, but it might be easier to read if you write it as 2

7.10.17  10:27 am   Do you have merchandise

     i really really don't want to but i might have to, in order to stop other people from selling merchandise based on my material

7.10.17  10:00 am   what was the inspiration for time mop (the song, not the video) and why is it called time mop

     i did 4 in a row. they were instrumental. i was trying to shock myself back into recording, by making bold/brash moves. time mop was the 3rd one out of the 4. they were all made within a 2 day period

7.10.17  9:55 am   have you ever considered stopping to make music/videos and instead focus all of your time into being a full-time question answerererer? 

     no

7.10.17  9:52 am   What is your opinion on gravity?

     it is helpful, and useful

7.10.17  9:45 am   Do you think you will ever write, record, and upload a song (or instrumental) that utilizes the full mash?

     i can think of at least 1 song and 1 video where i have used it

7.10.17  9:24 am   why does history of the entire world, i guess also include a brief history of the universe? did you guess wrongly? or did you just decide not to include it in the title because it was so brief?

     i think the universe is part of the world. althought that video mostly focuses on human existence

7.10.17  9:22 am   Do you like wearing hats for fashion purposes?

     i wish there were more types. it seems like every type of hat is either related to baseball or else is some specific throwback to the early 1900s

7.10.17  7:51 am   if we all did not mind ads because you were being monetized, would you allow ads?

     i guess so. i will let you know when i have heard from all the millions of people who have viewed my channel, or who ever plan to view my channel, in the future
